Other Information.Additional Info: CO2 permeance decreases by about 75% under an electric field of 500 V/mm.
Propene permeance drops less compared to propane, increasing the separation factor from 6 to 8 under an electric field.
Propane permeance drops more than propene, enhancing the separation factor under an electric field.

Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: CO2 permeance reduction by 75%; propene/propane selectivity increased from 6 to 8.

Other Information.Additional Info: Electric field induces a metastable polymorph with reduced lattice flexibility, sharpening molecular sieving.

Other Information.Test Conditions: Room temperature, light switching (365 nm and 455 nm)
Other Information.Additional Info: Permeance of H2 remains unchanged during trans-cis switching of AZO groups.

Other Information.Test Conditions: Room temperature, light switching (365 nm and 455 nm)
Other Information.Additional Info: CO2 permeance is much lower in the cis state compared to the trans state.

Other Information.Test Conditions: Room temperature, light switching (365 nm and 455 nm)
Other Information.Additional Info: Permeance of N2 remains unchanged during trans-cis switching of AZO groups.

Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: CO2 permeance significantly reduced in cis state; H2 and N2 permeances remain unchanged.

Other Information.Additional Info: AZO groups in the side chains are reversibly switched between trans and cis states using light, affecting CO2 permeance.

Other Information.Test Conditions: Visible light photo-switching (400 nm and 530 nm)
Other Information.Additional Info: H2 permeance remains constant during visible light photo-switching.

Other Information.Test Conditions: Visible light photo-switching (400 nm and 530 nm)
Other Information.Additional Info: C2H4 permeance changes due to interaction with dipole moment of cis-AZO groups.

Other Information.Test Conditions: Visible light photo-switching (400 nm and 530 nm)
Other Information.Additional Info: C3H6 permeance changes due to interaction with dipole moment of cis-AZO groups.

Experimental Validation.Method: Visible light photo-switching (400 nm and 530 nm)
Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: H2:C2H4 and H2:C3H6 separation factors vary upon illumination.

Other Information.Additional Info: Fluorinated AZO-containing linkers allow visible light photo-switching, influencing olefin permeance.
